Using Persistent Grid (pre-alpha)

Make sure you have Persistent Grid installed.

For a real implementation of Persistent Grid Framework, check Persistent Grid's project pages on Github.

Grid

At the time of writing, the easiest way is to copy screen.scss from the grid template into your sass (or scss) directory. Alternatively, you can copy/paste this into a (new) file in your Compass project:

The grid template can be found in path_to_your_compass_directory/extensions/persistentgrid/templates

Base

At the time of writing, the easiest way is to copy screen.scss from the base template into your sass (or scss) directory. Alternatively, you can copy/paste this into a (new) file in your Compass project:

The base template can be found in path_to_your_compass_directory/extensions/persistentgrid/templates
